trans-unit.source: Displays hierarchical data, such as a table of contents, in a tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 在树结构中显示分层数据，例如的内容，表。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Nodes](#nodes) - [Static Data](#static_data) - [Binding to Data](#binding_to_data) - [Dynamic Node Population](#dynamic_node_population) - [Customizing the User Interface](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [Events](#events) - [Scrolling](#scrolling) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction The TreeView control is used to display hierarchical data, such as a table of contents or file directory, in a tree structure and supports the following features: - Data binding that allows the nodes of the control to be bound to XML, tabular, or relational data.
trans-unit.target: 本主题中:-[简介](#introduction) - [节点](#nodes) - [静态数据](#static_data) - [绑定到数据](#binding_to_data) - [动态节点填充](#dynamic_node_population) - [自定义用户界面](#customizing_the_user_interface) - [事件](#events) - [滚动](#scrolling) - [可访问性](#accessibility) - [声明性语法](#declarative_syntax) # # 简介 TreeView 控件可用于在树结构中显示分层数据，例如目录或文件目录的表，并支持以下功能:-数据绑定，允许要绑定到 XML，表格，或关系数据的控件节点。

trans-unit.source: - Site navigation through integration with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: -站点通过与集成导航<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>

trans-unit.source: - Node text that can be displayed as either plain text or hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 节点可以显示为纯文本或超链接的文本。

trans-unit.source: - Programmatic access to the TreeView object model to create trees, populate nodes, set properties, and so on dynamically.
trans-unit.target: -TreeView 对象模型，以便创建树、 填充节点、 等动态设置属性，以编程方式访问。

trans-unit.source: - Client-side node population (on supported browsers).
trans-unit.target: 的 （在支持的浏览器） 客户端节点填充。

trans-unit.source: - The ability to display a check box next to each node.
trans-unit.target: 显示每个节点旁的复选框的功能。

trans-unit.source: - Customizable appearance through themes, user-defined images, and styles.
trans-unit.target: 通过主题、 用户定义的自定义外观的图像和样式。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The TreeView control is designed to be used inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control only when <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> TreeView 控件设计内部使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制时，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> controls are used to update selected regions of a page instead of updating the whole page with a postback.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制用于更新而不是使用回发更新整个页面的页面的选定的区域。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[UpdatePanel 控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[局部页面呈现概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Nodes The TreeView control is made up of nodes.
trans-unit.target: # # TreeView 控件组成的节点的节点。

trans-unit.source: Each entry in the tree is called a node and is represented by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 在树中的每个条目都称为一个节点，它由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Node types are defined as follows: - A node that contains other nodes is called a *parent node*.
trans-unit.target: 节点类型定义，如下所示:-包含其他节点的节点称为*父节点*。

trans-unit.source: - The node that is contained by another node is called a *child node*.
trans-unit.target: 的包含的另一个节点节点称为*子节点*。

trans-unit.source: - A node that has no children is called a *leaf node*.
trans-unit.target: 的没有任何子级节点称为*叶节点*。

trans-unit.source: - The node that is not contained by any other node but is the ancestor to all the other nodes is the *root node*.
trans-unit.target: -节点不包含任何其他节点并且是所有其他节点的上级的是*根节点*。

trans-unit.source: A node can be both a parent and a child, but root, parent, and leaf nodes are mutually exclusive.
trans-unit.target: 节点可以是父级和子级，但根，父级，和叶节点是互相排斥。

trans-unit.source: Several visual and behavioral properties of nodes are determined by whether a node is a root, child, or leaf node.
trans-unit.target: 节点的多个视觉和行为的属性确定一个节点为根、 子或叶节点。

trans-unit.source: Although a typical tree structure has only one root node, the TreeView control allows you to add multiple root nodes to your tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 尽管典型的树形结构具有只有一个根节点，但 TreeView 控件允许你将多个根节点添加到你树结构。

trans-unit.source: This is useful when you want to display item listings without displaying a single root node, as in a list of product categories.
trans-unit.target: 当你想要显示项列表而不显示单个根节点，如下所示的产品类别列表时，这非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Each node has a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每个节点具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property is displayed in the TreeView, while the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property is used to store any additional data about the node, such as data that is passed to the postback event that is associated with the node.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性显示在树视图，而<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性用来存储有关该节点，如与节点相关联的回发事件传递数据的任何其他数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: A node can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: 节点可以是在两种模式之一中︰ 选择模式和导航模式。

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to a value other than an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性为空字符串以外的值的节点 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To put a node into selection mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性节点为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Some Internet browsers have a limitation that can affect the performance of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 某些 Internet 浏览器具有一个限制，即可能会影响 TreeView 控件的性能。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 has a URL character limit of 2067 characters that it posts.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 6.0 具有的 URL 字符限制为发的 2067年字符。

trans-unit.source: If the number of characters in a URL of a node is larger than that number, expanding that node will fail and no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果某个节点的 URL 中的字符数大于该数字，展开该节点将失败，并且不会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: ## Static Data The simplest data model of the TreeView control is static data.
trans-unit.target: # # 静态数据 TreeView 控件的最简单的数据模型是静态的数据。

trans-unit.source: To display static data using declarative syntax, first nest opening and closing `<Nodes>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: 若要显示使用声明性语法的静态数据，请首先打开和关闭`<Nodes>`开始和结束标记的树视图控件之间的标记。

trans-unit.source: Next, create the tree structure by nesting `<asp:TreeNode>` elements between the opening and closing `<Nodes>` tags.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，按照嵌套创建树状结构`<asp:TreeNode>`元素开始标记和结束之间`<Nodes>`标记。

trans-unit.source: Each `<asp:TreeNode>` element represents a node in the tree and maps to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 每个`<asp:TreeNode>`元素表示树中的节点，并将映射到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can set the properties of each node by setting the attributes of its `<asp:TreeNode>` element.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置特性的设置的每个节点属性其`<asp:TreeNode>`元素。

trans-unit.source: To create child nodes, nest additional `<asp:TreeNode>` elements between the opening and closing `<asp:TreeNode>` tags of the parent node.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建子节点，嵌套其他`<asp:TreeNode>`元素开始标记和结束之间`<asp:TreeNode>`父节点的标记。

trans-unit.source: ## Binding to Data The TreeView control can also be bound to data.
trans-unit.target: # # 绑定到数据 TreeView 控件还可以绑定到数据。

trans-unit.source: You can use either of two methods to bind the TreeView control to the appropriate data source type: - The TreeView control can use any data source control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource> interface, such as an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> control or a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用两种方法之一将 TreeView 控件绑定到相应的数据源类型:-TreeView 控件可以使用任何数据源控件，实现<xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>接口，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource>控件或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.XmlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.IHierarchicalDataSource>

trans-unit.source: To bind to a data source control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A> property of the TreeView control to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> value of the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定到数据源控件，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>到 TreeView 控件的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>数据源控件的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataBoundControl.DataSourceID%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeView control automatically binds to the specified data source control.
trans-unit.target: TreeView 控件自动将绑定到指定的数据源控件。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred method to bind to data.
trans-unit.target: 这是将绑定到数据的首选的方法。

trans-unit.source: - The TreeView control can also be bound to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> object or a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> object with relations.
trans-unit.target: TreeView 控件也可以绑定到<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>对象或<xref:System.Data.DataSet>具有关系对象。</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>

trans-unit.source: To bind to one of these data sources, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A> property of the TreeView control to the data source, and then call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要将绑定到这些数据源之一，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>属性的树视图控件拖到数据源，然后调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到数据源的每个数据项都包含 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 的多个属性节点显示返回的值`ToString`的数据项，默认情况下的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 对于 XML 元素，节点显示的元素名称，其显示在树的基础结构，但其他方面不是非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过指定树节点绑定使用绑定到特定数据项属性节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection contains `TreeNodeBinding` objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合包含`TreeNodeBinding`定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify the criteria for binding and the data item property to display in the node.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定的绑定和数据项属性的节点中显示的条件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on tree node bindings, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 在树节点绑定上的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the TreeView control that the page developer is not displaying.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 恶意用户可以创建回调请求，并且未显示页面开发人员的树视图控件节点中获取数据。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，数据源必须实现的数据的安全。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A> property to hide data.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>属性来隐藏数据。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.MaxDataBindDepth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dynamic Node Population Sometimes, it is not practical to statically define the tree structure because the data source returns too much data or because the data to display depends on information that you get at run time.
trans-unit.target: # # 动态节点填充有时，它是不可行以静态定义树的结构，因为数据源返回的数据太多，或者要显示的数据取决于在运行时获取的信息。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the TreeView control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，TreeView 控件支持动态节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: To populate a node dynamically, you must define an event-handling method that contains the logic to populate a node for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要动态填充一个节点，必须定义包含用于填充的节点的逻辑的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: Browsers that support callback scripts can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器支持回调脚本还可以利用客户端节点填充。

trans-unit.source: (This includes Internet Explorer 5.5 and later and some other browsers.) Client-side node population enables the TreeView control to populate a node using client script when users expand the node, without requiring a round trip to the server.
trans-unit.target: （这包括 Internet Explorer 5.5 和更高版本以及某些其他浏览器。）客户端节点填充使要填充时用户展开节点，而无需到服务器的往返行程使用客户端脚本的节点的树视图控件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Customizing the User Interface There are many ways to customize the appearance of the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: # # 自定义用户界面那里很多种 TreeView 控件的外观进行自定义。

trans-unit.source: First, you can specify a different style (such as font size and color) for each of the node types.
trans-unit.target: 首先，你可以为每个节点类型指定不同的样式 （如字体大小和颜色）。

trans-unit.source: If you use cascading style sheets (CSS) to customize the appearance of the control, use either inline styles or a separate CSS file, but not both.
trans-unit.target: 级联样式表 (CSS) 用于自定义控件的外观，如果使用内联样式或单独的 CSS 文件，但不要同时。

trans-unit.source: Using both inline styles and a separate CSS file could cause unexpected results.
trans-unit.target: 使用内联样式和单独的 CSS 文件可能会导致意外的结果。

trans-unit.source: For more information on using style sheets with controls, see [Web Server Controls and CSS Styles](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 在上使用的控件的样式表的详细信息，请参阅[Web 服务器控件和 CSS 样式](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available node styles.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的节点样式。

trans-unit.source: |Node style property|Description| |-------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for the leaf nodes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>|The default style settings for a node.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for the parent nodes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for the root node.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>|The style settings for a selected node.| You can also control the style of nodes at specific depths within the tree by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: |节点样式属性 |说明 | |-------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>|当鼠标指针悬停的节点的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>|叶节点的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>|节点的默认样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>|父节点的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>|根节点的样式设置。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>|所选节点的样式设置。 | 你可以通过使用来控制节点在树中的特定深度的样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the first level in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第一个样式对应于的节点在树中的第一个级别的样式。

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of the nodes at the second level in the tree, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第二个样式对应于的节点在树中，依次类推中的第二个级别的样式。

trans-unit.source: This is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain depth should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 这是最常用于生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一深度节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If a style is defined for a certain depth level using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection, that style overrides any root, parent, or leaf node style settings for the nodes at that depth.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果某些深度级别使用定义样式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>集合，因此样式重写任何根、 父节点还是叶节点的节点的该深度的样式设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another way to alter the appearance of the control is to customize the images that are displayed in the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改控件的外观的另一种方法是自定义树视图控件中显示的图像的。

trans-unit.source: You can specify your own custom set of images for the different parts of the control by setting the properties shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过设置以下表所示的属性来指定您自己自定义控件的不同部分的图像集。

trans-unit.source: |Image property|Description| |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image displayed for the collapsible node indicator.
trans-unit.target: |图像属性 |说明 | |--------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>|为可折叠的节点的指示符显示的图像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image is usually a minus sign (-).| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image displayed for the expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 此映像通常是一个减号 （-）。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>|用于可展开的节点的指示符显示的图像的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: This image is usually a plus sign (+).| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>|The URL to the folder containing the line images used to connect parent nodes to child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 此映像通常是一个加号 （+）。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>|用来连接到子节点的父节点包含行映像的文件夹的 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property must also be set to `true` for this property to have an effect.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>|The URL to an image displayed for the non-expandable node indicator.| > [!NOTE] > You do not need to customize every image property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>属性还必须设置为`true`此属性才有效。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>|用于非可展开的节点的指示符显示的图像的 URL。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;> 不需要自定义每个图像属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: If an image property is not explicitly set, the built-in default image is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未显式设置映像属性，会使用内置的默认图像。

trans-unit.source: The TreeView control also allows you to display a check box next to a node.
trans-unit.target: TreeView 控件还可以显示一个节点旁的复选框。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property is set to a value other than `TreeNodeTypes.None`, check boxes are displayed next to the specified node types.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性设置为值`TreeNodeTypes.None`，指定的节点类型旁显示复选框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property can be set to a bitwise combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes> enumeration member values.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性可以设置为的按位组合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes>枚举成员值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeTypes> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Each time the page is posted to the server, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> collection is automatically populated with the selected nodes.
trans-unit.target: 该页发送到服务器，每次<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>集合会自动填充的所选节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: When check boxes are displayed, you can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged> event to run a custom routine whenever the state of a check box changes between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: 复选框显示时，你可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged>事件的发往服务器之间的复选框的状态发生更改时运行的自定义的例程。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged>

trans-unit.source: ## Events The TreeView control provides several events that you can program against.
trans-unit.target: # # 事件 TreeView 控件提供可以编程的多个事件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你每次事件发生时运行的自定义的例程。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events that are supported by the TreeView control.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出受 TreeView 控件的事件。

trans-unit.source: |Event|Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||Occurs when the check boxes of the TreeView control change state between posts to the server.| ||Occurs when a node is selected in the TreeView control.| ||Occurs when a node is expanded in the TreeView control.| ||Occurs when a node is collapsed in the TreeView control.| ||Occurs when a node with its property set to `true` is expanded in the TreeView control.| ||Occurs when a data item is bound to a node in the TreeView control.| ## Scrolling The TreeView control does not have built-in scrolling.
trans-unit.target: |事件 |说明 | |-----------|-----------------| ||TreeView 控件的复选框将发往服务器之间的状态更改时发生。 | ||TreeView 控件中选定了一个节点时发生。 | ||TreeView 控件中展开节点后发生。 | ||TreeView 控件中折叠了一个节点时发生。 | ||当一个节点时发生其属性设置为`true`展开树视图控件中。 | ||当数据项绑定到 TreeView 控件中的节点时发生。 | # # 滚动树视图控件时，没有内置滚动。

trans-unit.source: To add scrolling, place the TreeView control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control and add scrollbars to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> control.
trans-unit.target: 要添加滚动，放在树视图控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控件并将添加到的滚动条<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Panel>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Panel Web Server Control Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[面板 Web 服务器控件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility The markup rendered by default for this control might not conform to accessibility standards.
trans-unit.target: # # 辅助功能默认情况下，对于此控件呈现的标记可能不符合辅助功能标准。

trans-unit.source: For details about accessibility support for this control, see [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 对于此控件的辅助功能支持的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 控件和可访问性](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                                                                                                                                                                 ```
trans-unit.target: # # 声明性语法```                                                                                                                                                                                 ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Use the TreeView constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> class.
trans-unit.target: TreeView 构造函数用于创建和初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>的新实例

trans-unit.source: To add a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to a page dynamically, create a new <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> object, set its properties, and then add it to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection of a container control, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要添加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>动态控制到页上，创建一个新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>对象、 设置其属性，并将其添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName>集合的容器控件，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PlaceHolder> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Adds HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 将 HTML 特性和需要呈现的样式添加到指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: AddAttributesToRender 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control automatically generates tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件自动生成的树节点绑定。

trans-unit.source: Tree node bindings define the relationship between a data item and the node it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: 树节点绑定所定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control needs to know which data item property to bind to which <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> property.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定到其中的每个数据项包含多个属性 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 的数据源时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件需要知道哪个数据项属性绑定到哪个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If the AutoGenerateDataBindings property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control automatically generates default tree node bindings that set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that is associated with the binding to the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AutoGenerateDataBindings 属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件自动生成设置的默认树节点绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>与返回的值绑定相关联的对象`ToString`数据项目的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The automatically generated tree node bindings are not added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 不会自动生成的树节点绑定添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the value that is returned by the `ToString` method is the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the XML file, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 在 XML 元素，返回的值的情况下`ToString`方法是元素名称，但显示的基础结构的 XML 文件中，否则不是非常有用。

trans-unit.source: To create a more useful tree, you must define your own tree node bindings by populating the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个更有用的树，必须定义你自己的树节点绑定通过填充<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you define a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A> collection, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control uses those values instead of automatically generated tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果定义<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>集合，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件而不是自动生成的树节点绑定中使用这些值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to have the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control automatically generate tree node bindings; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>具有<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件自动生成的树节点绑定; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects that represent the nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control that display a selected check box.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>对象，表示在节点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>显示选中的复选框控件。

trans-unit.source: When check boxes are displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control (by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> property to a value other than `TreeNodeType.None`), use the CheckedNodes property to determine which nodes display a selected check box.
trans-unit.target: 如果复选框将显示在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件 (通过设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A>属性的值以外的其他`TreeNodeType.None`)，使用 CheckedNodes 属性来确定哪些节点显示选中的复选框。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowCheckBoxes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used to iterate through all the nodes that have a selected check box in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 此集合通常用于循环访问已选中的复选框，在树中的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged> event is raised when the check boxes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control change state between posts to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged>引发事件时的复选框<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件更改发往服务器之间的状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCheckChanged>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating a database or the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新数据库或显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The CheckedNodes collection is populated using a depth-first traversal of the tree structure: each parent node is processed down to its child nodes before the next parent node is populated.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 使用树形结构的深度优先遍历填充 CheckedNodes 集合︰ 之前填充下一步的父节点，处理每个父节点及其子节点下。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> that contains the nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> that display a selected check box.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>包含中的节点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>显示选中的复选框。

trans-unit.source: Closes every node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 关闭在树中的每个节点。

trans-unit.source: The CollapseAll method provides a convenient way to close every node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 全部折叠方法提供了一种简便方式关闭在树中的每个节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip for the image that is displayed for the collapsible node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可折叠的节点的指示符显示的图像的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Use the CollapseImageToolTip property to specify a ToolTip for the collapsible image.
trans-unit.target: CollapseImageToolTip 属性用于指定可折叠的映像的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的文本，提供可用来使控件更易于访问的映像的说明的辅助技术设备。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip for the image displayed for the collapsible node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 为可折叠的节点的指示符显示的图像的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自定义映像的可折叠节点指示符的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the CollapseImageUrl property to specify a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.
trans-unit.target: CollapseImageUrl 属性用于指定可折叠节点指示符的自定义映像。

trans-unit.source: This image is displayed next to a collapsible node and is usually a minus sign (-).
trans-unit.target: 此映像可折叠节点旁边显示，并且通常是一个减号 （-）。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or a minus sign(-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或占位符图像旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and CollapseImageUrl properties to the URLs for the custom images.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和 CollapseImageUrl 属性添加到自定义图像的 Url。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。

trans-unit.source: To hide the expansion node indicators, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To ensure that nodes align correctly in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and CollapseImageUrl properties have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 以确保节点中正确对齐<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制使用自定义映像时，请确保指定的所有映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，并且 CollapseImageUrl 属性具有相同的维度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When using a custom image for the collapsible node indicator, you should also consider setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageToolTip%2A> property to specify a ToolTip for the image.
trans-unit.target: 在自定义映像用作可折叠节点指示符时，你还应考虑设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageToolTip%2A>属性来指定映像的工具提示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image to display for collapsible nodes.
trans-unit.target: 要为可折叠节点所显示的自定义图像 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default minus sign (-) image.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将显示默认减号 （-） 图像。

trans-unit.source: Creates a collection to store child controls.
trans-unit.target: 创建用于存储子控件的集合。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control does not support embedding of child controls.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件不支持嵌入的子控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This method has been overridden to prevent the addition of child controls and always returns an <xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法已被重写以防止添加子控件，并始终返回<xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Always returns an <xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref href="System.Web.UI.EmptyControlCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 返回的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: The CreateNode is a helper method.
trans-unit.target: CreateNode 是一个帮助器方法。

trans-unit.source: The CreateNode method is a helper method that returns a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class.
trans-unit.target: CreateNode 方法是返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>的新实例的帮助器方法

trans-unit.source: The CreateNode method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: CreateNode 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: Control developers that want to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> class by extending the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class should override this method to return an object that derives from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>.
trans-unit.target: 控件开发人员想要扩展<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>通过扩展的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>类应重写此方法以返回从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>派生的对象</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>的类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: A common reason to extend the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> class is to override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.RenderPreText%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.RenderPostText%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 若要扩展的常见原因<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>类是重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.RenderPreText%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.RenderPostText%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.RenderPostText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.RenderPreText%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: A new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*> method of the base class.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>方法的基的类。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl.DataBind*>

trans-unit.source: Data bound controls should override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding%2A> method instead of the DataBind method.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定控件应重写<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding%2A>方法而非数据绑定方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PerformDataBinding%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref> objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding"></xref>定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系的对象。

trans-unit.source: The DataBindings collection contains <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects that define the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定集合包含<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>定义数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: When binding to a data source where each data item contains multiple properties (such as an XML element with several attributes), a node displays the value that is returned by the `ToString` method of the data item, by default.
trans-unit.target: 当绑定到数据源的每个数据项都包含 （如具有多个特性的 XML 元素） 的多个属性节点显示返回的值`ToString`的数据项，默认情况下的方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of an XML element, the node displays the element name, which shows the underlying structure of the tree, but is not very useful otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 对于 XML 元素，该节点显示的元素名称，但显示的基础结构的树中，否则不是非常有用。

trans-unit.source: You can bind a node to a specific data item property by specifying tree node bindings.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过指定的树节点绑定来绑定到特定数据项属性节点。

trans-unit.source: When defining the relationship between a data item and a node, you must specify both the criteria for binding and the values to bind to the properties of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object.
trans-unit.target: 在定义数据项和节点之间的关系时，必须指定为绑定和值要绑定到的属性的两个条件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The criteria indicate when a data item should be bound to a node.
trans-unit.target: 该条件指示应在何时数据项绑定到的节点。

trans-unit.source: The criteria can be specified with a node depth, a data member, or both.
trans-unit.target: 与节点深度和 / 或数据成员，可以指定条件。

trans-unit.source: A node depth specifies the node level that gets bound.
trans-unit.target: 节点深度指定获取绑定的节点级别。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you specify a node depth of 0, all nodes in the tree structure at level 0 are bound using the tree node binding.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你指定的节点深度为 0，级别 0 树状结构中的所有节点会都绑定使用的树节点绑定。

trans-unit.source: A data member specifies the type of the data item in the underlying data source, but can represent different information depending on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 数据成员在基础数据源中，指定的数据项目类型，但可以表示不同的信息，具体取决于数据源。

trans-unit.source: For example, the data member for an XML element specifies the name of the element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，XML 元素的数据成员指定元素的名称。

trans-unit.source: If multiple <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> objects are defined that conflict with each other, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control applies the tree node bindings in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择多个<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象定义相互冲突<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件适用以下优先顺序中的树节点绑定︰ 1。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines both a depth and a data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>定义深度和数据成员的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines only the depth.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象，用于定义仅的深度。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines only the data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>定义仅的数据成员的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding> object that defines neither the depth nor the data member.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>对象，用于定义深度和数据成员都不。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>

trans-unit.source: If multiple bindings are specified that meet the same precedence criteria, the first binding in the collection is applied.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个绑定指定了符合相同的优先级条件，则应用集合中的第一个绑定。

trans-unit.source: Once the binding criteria is established, you can then bind a property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that can be bound to a value.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立绑定条件时，你可以随后绑定的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>可以绑定到一个值的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can either bind to an attribute or field of a data item or display a static value.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将绑定到某个属性或字段的数据项，或显示静态值。

trans-unit.source: For more information on binding the properties of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to a value, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 有关绑定的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象转换为一个值，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>属性的详细信息

trans-unit.source: Although the DataBindings collection can be programmatically populated, it is usually set declaratively.
trans-unit.target: 尽管可以以编程方式填充数据绑定集合，它通常以声明方式设置。

trans-unit.source: To specify the tree node bindings, first nest opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags between the opening and closing tags of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定的树节点绑定，应首先嵌套开始和结束`<DataBindings>`开始和结束标记之间的标记<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Next, place `<asp:TreeNodeBinding>` elements between the opening and closing `<DataBindings>` tags for each tree node binding you want to specify.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，将放置`<asp:TreeNodeBinding>`元素开始标记和结束之间`<DataBindings>`标记每个树节点绑定你想要指定。

trans-unit.source: When data bindings are created by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to `true`, the bindings that are created have the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定中设置的创建时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制转移到`true`，创建的绑定具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.AutoGenerateDataBindings%2A>

trans-unit.source: Data bindings that are created declaratively have the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 以声明方式创建的数据绑定都具有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>属性设置为`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBinding.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the declarative syntax allows you to control the behavior of individual data bindings.
trans-unit.target: 使用声明性语法，可控制各个数据绑定的行为。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"></xref> that represents the relationship between a data item and the node that it is binding to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeBindingCollection"> </xref> ，表示数据项和它所绑定到的节点之间的关系。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control renders client-side script to handle expanding and collapsing events.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件呈现客户端脚本，用于处理展开和折叠事件。

trans-unit.source: Use the EnableClientScript property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control renders client-side script on compatible browsers to handle expanding and collapsing events.
trans-unit.target: EnableClientScript 属性用于指定是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件呈现兼容的浏览器来处理展开和折叠事件上的客户端脚本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, compatible browsers execute the code to expand and collapse nodes on the client.
trans-unit.target: 当此属性设置为`true`，兼容的浏览器执行的代码可展开和折叠客户端上的节点。

trans-unit.source: The tree node data must be known in advance for the client-side script to work.
trans-unit.target: 必须为客户端脚本，以便提前知道树节点数据。

trans-unit.source: Using client script prevents a post back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 使用客户端脚本可以阻止发布回服务器每次节点是展开还是折叠。

trans-unit.source: When the tree node data is not known in advance, nodes can be populated from the client, if the `PopulateNodesFromClient` property is also set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 节点时提前不知道的树节点数据，可以从客户端，如果填充`PopulateNodesFromClient`属性也设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: In this scenario, you must also provide an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event to populate the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 在此方案中，你还必须提供的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>事件以填充节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the EnableClientScript property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control posts back to the server each time a node is expanded or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果 EnableClientScript 属性设置为`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件回发到服务器每次节点是展开还是折叠。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性不能通过主题或样式表主题设置。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 主题和皮肤](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to render the client-side script on compatible browsers; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>呈现兼容的浏览器上的客户端脚本否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Opens every node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 打开树中的每个节点。

trans-unit.source: The ExpandAll method provides a convenient way to open every node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 全部展开方法提供了一种简便方式打开树中的每个节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of levels that are expanded when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control is displayed for the first time.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置时所展开的级别数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>首次显示控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ExpandDepth property to control the rendering of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control the first time that it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ExpandDepth 属性来控制的呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制显示的第一个时间。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: On subsequent postbacks, the nodes retain their current expanded state.
trans-unit.target: 在后续回发，这些节点保留其当前的展开的状态。

trans-unit.source: The depth to display when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> is initially displayed.
trans-unit.target: 时要显示的深度<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>最初显示。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which displays all the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，其中显示了所有节点。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ToolTip for the image that is displayed for the expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可展开的节点的指示符显示的图像的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Use the ExpandImageToolTip property to specify a ToolTip for the image.
trans-unit.target: ExpandImageToolTip 属性用于指定映像的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: The text that you specify provides Assistive Technology devices with a description of the image that can be used to make the control more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 你指定的文本，提供可用来使控件更易于访问的映像的说明的辅助技术设备。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值设置时，可以自动保存到的资源文件通过使用设计器工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[全球化和本地化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip for the image displayed for the expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 用于可展开的节点的指示符显示的图像的工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作可展开的节点的指示符的自定义图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the ExpandImageUrl property to specify a custom image for the expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: ExpandImageUrl 属性用于指定用于可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。

trans-unit.source: This image is displayed next to an expandable node and is usually a plus sign (+).
trans-unit.target: 此映像可展开节点旁边显示，并且通常是一个加号 （+）。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或占位符图像旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, ExpandImageUrl, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties to the URLs for the custom images.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>，ExpandImageUrl，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。

trans-unit.source: To hide the expansion node indicators, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To ensure that nodes align correctly in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>, ExpandImageUrl, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 以确保节点中正确对齐<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制使用自定义映像时，请确保指定的所有映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>，ExpandImageUrl，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>属性具有相同的尺寸。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To display a custom image correctly, you may need to set <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要正确显示的自定义映像，你可能需要设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>到`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using a custom image for the expandable node indicator, you should also consider setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageToolTip%2A> property to specify a ToolTip for the image.
trans-unit.target: 在自定义映像用作可展开的节点指示符时，你还应考虑设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageToolTip%2A>属性来指定映像的工具提示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageToolTip%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image to display for expandable nodes.
trans-unit.target: 要为可展开节点显示自定义图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default plus sign (+) image.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将显示默认加号 （+） 映像。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control at the specified value path.
trans-unit.target: 检索<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>对象在<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件的指定的值路径。

trans-unit.source: Use the FindNode method to get a node from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control at the specified value path.
trans-unit.target: FindNode 方法用于获取节点从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件的指定的值路径。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The value path contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.
trans-unit.target: 值路径包含窗体中的根节点的当前节点的路径的节点值的分隔符分隔列表。

trans-unit.source: Each node stores its value path in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 每个节点存储中的其值路径<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A> property specifies the delimiter character that is used to separate the node values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>属性指定用于分隔节点值的分隔符字符。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PathSeparator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value path of a node.
trans-unit.target: 节点的值路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> at the specified value path.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref>位于指定的值路径。

trans-unit.source: Returns the result of a callback event that targets a control.
trans-unit.target: 返回的结果以控件为目标的回调事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> interface and uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> to retrieve data and the GetCallbackResult method to return the retrieved data to the control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件实现<xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler>接口并使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>检索数据和 GetCallbackResult 方法检索到的数据返回到控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ICallbackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The results of the callback.
trans-unit.target: 回调的结果。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>允许你设置节点的外观，当鼠标指针悬停的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the HoverNodeStyle property to control the appearance of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: HoverNodeStyle 属性用于控制节点的外观，当鼠标指针悬停。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object that it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>它将返回的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `HoverNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `HoverNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: This feature is supported only on script-capable clients.
trans-unit.target: 仅在支持脚本的客户端上支持此功能。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To use the HoverNodeStyle property, you must include a `<head>` element with a `runat="server"` attribute.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 若要使用 HoverNodeStyle 属性，必须包括`<head>`具有元素`runat="server"`属性。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 按以下顺序应用样式属性︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: HoverNodeStyle.
trans-unit.target: HoverNodeStyle。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The style settings for the HoverNodeStyle property override any corresponding node style settings that are in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> HoverNodeStyle 属性的样式设置重写中的任何相应节点样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The HoverNodeStyle property is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: HoverNodeStyle 属性不呈现的节点其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> properties, which are <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> objects, the HoverNodeStyle property is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>属性，它们是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象，HoverNodeStyle 属性是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of a node when the mouse pointer is positioned over it.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>当鼠标指针悬停表示节点的样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of images to use for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要使用的图像的组<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ImageSet property to specify the group of images to use for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ImageSet 属性指定的映像以用于组<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can either select a predefined set of images to give the control a standard look or define your own custom set.
trans-unit.target: 你可以选择一组预定义的映像以使控件具有标准外观或定义你自己的自定义一组。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The ImageSet property does not affect any style settings for a node.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> ImageSet 属性不会影响节点任何样式设置。

trans-unit.source: Set the appropriate style property, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property, if you want to add custom colors and spacing.
trans-unit.target: 设置适当的样式属性，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>属性，如果你想要添加自定义颜色和间距。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the valid values for The ImageSet property.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出 ImageSet 属性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: |Image set|Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`|A predefined image set that uses arrow images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`|A predefined image set that uses diamond-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`|A predefined image set that uses square-shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`|A predefined set of sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`|A predefined set of alternate sectioned, diamond shaped bullet images in sizes that vary by level.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`|A predefined image set that uses MSN Messenger images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`|A user-defined image set.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Events`|A predefined image set that uses event log-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Faq`|A predefined image set that uses FAQ-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`|A predefined image set that uses e-mail-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.News`|A predefined image set that uses newsgroup-styled images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple`|A predefined image set that uses simple shape outlines.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`|A predefined image set that uses simple filled shapes.| |`TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`|A predefined image set that uses MSDN images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`|A predefined image set that uses Microsoft Windows Help images.| |`TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`|A predefined image set that uses Windows Explorer images available in Microsoft Windows XP.| When defining a custom set of images, you should specify an image for each of the properties in the following table.
trans-unit.target: |映像集 |说明 | |---------------|-----------------| |`TreeViewImageSet.Arrows`|使用箭头映像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList`|使用菱形项目符号图像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList2`|使用方形项目符号的图像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList3`|一组预定义分节的菱形形状项目符号图像。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.BulletedList4`|一组预定义的备用剖切，菱形项目符号图像的大小因级别而异。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Contacts`|使用 MSN Messenger 映像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`|用户定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Events`|使用事件日志样式的图像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Faq`|使用常见问题样式的图像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Inbox`|使用电子邮件样式的图像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.News`|使用新闻组样式的图像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple`|使用简单形状轮廓的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Simple2`|使用简单已填充的形状的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.Msdn`|使用 MSDN 映像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.WindowsHelp`|使用 Microsoft Windows 帮助映像的预定义的图像集。 | |`TreeViewImageSet.XPFileExplorer`|使用 Microsoft Windows XP 中可用的 Windows 资源管理器映像的预定义的图像集。 | 在定义一组自定义映像时，应为每个以下表中的属性来指定一个图像。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the default image for that property is used.
trans-unit.target: 否则，使用该属性的默认图像。

trans-unit.source: |Property|Description| |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>|The URL to a custom image for the collapsible node indicator.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>|The URL to a custom image for the expandable node indicator.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>|The URL to a folder that contains custom images for the lines that connect nodes.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>|The URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.| The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: |属性 |说明 | |--------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>|可折叠的节点的指示符的自定义图像的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>|用于可展开的节点的指示符的自定义图像的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A>|包含有关连接节点的行的自定义映像的文件夹的 URL。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A>|非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义图像的 URL。 | 此属性的值存储在视图状态。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NoExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LineImagesFolder%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeViewImageSet.Custom" name="TreeViewImageSet.Custom" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_TreeViewImageSet.Custom" name="TreeViewImageSet.Custom" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified image set is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的图像集不是一个<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeViewImageSet"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of leaf nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>对象，它允许你设置的叶节点的外观。

trans-unit.source: Use the LeafNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the leaf nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 LeafNodeStyle 属性来控制中的叶节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `LeafNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `LeafNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性︰ 1。
