trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是设置的单个样式属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the leaf nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>表示中的叶节点的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref> objects that represent the node styles at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style"></xref>表示树的单个级别上的节点样式的对象。

trans-unit.source: Use the LevelStyles collection as an alternative to the individual style properties (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A> property) to control the style of nodes at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 作为单个样式属性的替代方法，请使用 LevelStyles 集合 (如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>属性) 来控制节点的树中各个级别上的样式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the first level of the tree.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第一个样式对应于树的第一个级别中的节点的样式。

trans-unit.source: The second style in the collection corresponds to the style of nodes in the second level of the tree, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 集合中的第二个样式对应于为树中，依次类推的第二个级别中的节点的样式。

trans-unit.source: This property is most often used to generate table of contents–style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes.
trans-unit.target: 此属性通常用于确定生成表的内容 – 样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order: 1.
trans-unit.target: 按以下顺序应用样式属性︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the LevelStyles collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果定义的 LevelStyles 集合，则会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"></xref> that represents the node styles at the individual levels of the tree.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.StyleCollection"> </xref>表示树的单个级别上的节点样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path to a folder that contains the line images that are used to connect child nodes to parent nodes.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含用于连接到父节点的子节点的行映像的文件夹的路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can display lines that connect child nodes to parent nodes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件可以显示连接到父节点的子节点的行时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowLines%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When lines are displayed, use the LineImagesFolder property to specify a Web-accessible folder that contains the set of pre-rendered images to use for the lines.
trans-unit.target: 当显示行时，使用 LineImagesFolder 属性以指定包含的一套用于行预呈现的图像的 Web 访问文件夹。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the images that are used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述了使用映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: |Image|Description| |-----------|-----------------| |Dash.gif|A line image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure and the root node is a leaf.| |Dashminus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is expanded.| |Dashplus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the root node when there is only one root node in the tree structure to indicate that the root node is collapsed.| |I.gif|A line image displayed to connect adjacent nodes.| |L.gif|A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch when the node is a leaf.| |Lminus.gif|A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Lplus.gif|A line image displayed next to the last node in a branch to indicate that the node is collapsed.| |Minus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: |映像 |说明 | |-----------|-----------------| |Dash.gif|当树状结构中只有一个根节点并且根节点是叶节点的根节点旁边显示的线条图像。 | |Dashminus.gif|树状结构，以指示已展开的根节点中只有一个根节点时显示的根节点旁边的减号 （-） 映像。 | |Dashplus.gif|树状结构，以指示已折叠的根节点中只有一个根节点时显示的根节点旁边的加号 （+） 映像。 | |I.gif|显示连接相邻的节点的线条图像。 | |L.gif|显示的线条图像下一步到最后一个节点在分支中的叶节点时。 | |Lminus.gif|线条图像下一步到最后一个节点中显示一个分支，以便指示该节点已展开。 | |Lplus.gif|线条图像下一步到最后一个节点中显示一个分支，以便指示该节点已折叠。 | |Minus.gif|减号 （-） 包含多个根节点，以指示该节点已展开的树结构中的第一个根节点旁边显示图像。

trans-unit.source: This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been collapsed once.
trans-unit.target: 此图像不包含额外的行，并且仅一次折叠的根节点后显示。

trans-unit.source: When the page is first loaded, the Rminus.gif image is displayed.| |Noexpand.gif|A blank spacer image displayed next to a leaf node.
trans-unit.target: 如果首次加载页，将显示 Rminus.gif 图像。 | |Noexpand.gif|叶节点旁边显示的空白分隔条图像。

trans-unit.source: This image allows text to line up vertically.| |Plus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 此映像向上允许到行的文本垂直。 | |Plus.gif|显示树状结构包含多个根节点，则指示节点中的第一个根节点旁边的加号 （+） 映像处于折叠状态。

trans-unit.source: This image does not contain an extra line and is displayed only after the root node has been expanded once.
trans-unit.target: 此映像不包含额外的行和根节点展开一次后才显示。

trans-unit.source: When the page is first loaded, the Rplus.gif image is displayed.| |R.gif|A line image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is a leaf node.| |Rminus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果首次加载页，将显示 Rplus.gif 图像。 | |R.gif|在包含多个根节点，以指示该节点是叶节点的树结构中的第一个根节点旁边显示的线条图像。 | |Rminus.gif|减号 （-） 包含多个根节点，以指示该节点已展开的树结构中的第一个根节点旁边显示图像。

trans-unit.source: This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded.
trans-unit.target: 此映像包含额外的行，仅当首次加载页时，才显示。

trans-unit.source: After the root node has been collapsed once, The Minus.gif image is displayed.| |Rplus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to the first root node in a tree structure that contains multiple root nodes to indicate that the node is collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 一次折叠的根节点后，将显示 Minus.gif 映像。 | |Rplus.gif|显示树状结构包含多个根节点，则指示节点中的第一个根节点旁边的加号 （+） 映像处于折叠状态。

trans-unit.source: This image contains an extra line and is displayed only when the page is first loaded.
trans-unit.target: 此映像包含额外的行，仅当首次加载页时，才显示。

trans-unit.source: After the root node has been expanded once, the Plus.gif image is displayed.| |T.gif|A line image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is a leaf.| |Tminus.gif|A minus sign (-) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is expanded.| |Tplus.gif|A plus sign (+) image displayed next to a node in the middle of the tree structure (at a t-intersection) to indicate that the node is collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > If the LineImagesFolder property is not set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control will use the built-in, default images (20 x 20 pixels).
trans-unit.target: Plus.gif 映像已一次扩展根节点后，将显示。 | |T.gif|中间树形结构 （t 型交叉） 处的节点旁边的显示以指示该节点是叶行图像。 | |Tminus.gif|中间树形结构 （t 型交叉） 处的节点旁边的显示以指示该节点已展开的减号 （-） 映像。 | |Tplus.gif|中间树形结构 （t 型交叉） 处的节点旁边的显示以指示该节点已折叠的加号 （+） 映像。 | 1> [!NOTE] 1> LineImagesFolder 属性未设置，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件将使用内置的默认图像 （20 x 20 像素为单位）。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Some visual designers, such as Microsoft Visual Studio, provide tools to generate the line images.
trans-unit.target: 某些可视化设计器，如 Microsoft Visual Studio 提供生成的行映像的工具。

trans-unit.source: The run time does not flip custom images for right-to-left displays.
trans-unit.target: 运行的时不能翻转右到左显示的自定义的映像。

trans-unit.source: To support both left-to-right and right-to-left Web pages, you must create image sets for both directions.
trans-unit.target: 若要支持从左到右和从右到左的网页，你必须创建两个方向的映像集。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The path to a folder that contains the line images used to connect nodes.
trans-unit.target: 包含用于连接节点的行映像文件夹的路径。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that the LineImagesFolder property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示未设置 LineImagesFolder 属性。

trans-unit.source: Processes postback data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 进程回发数据<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET page framework tracks all the server controls that return `true` from the LoadPostData method call, and then invokes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A> method on those controls.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 页框架跟踪返回的所有服务器控件`true`从 LoadPostData 方法调用，并调用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>这些控件上的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RaisePostDataChangedEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The key identifier for the control.
trans-unit.target: 控件的密钥标识符。

trans-unit.source: The collection of all incoming name values.
trans-unit.target: 所有传入名称值的集合。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control's state changes as a result of the postback event; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件的状态发生更改，导致回发事件; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Loads the previously saved view state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 加载以前保存的视图状态的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: A object that contains the saved view state values for the control.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含控件保存的视图状态的值的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置树级别将绑定到的最大数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: When binding the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to a data source, use the MaxDataBindDepth property to limit the number of tree levels to bind to the control.
trans-unit.target: 在绑定时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制到数据源，请使用 MaxDataBindDepth 属性来限制要绑定到控件的树级别数。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For example, setting this property to `2` binds only the root node and any nodes that are immediately under the root node to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，将此属性设置为`2`将只有根节点和任何节点到根节点下的绑定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: All remaining nodes in the data source are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 数据源中的所有剩余节点将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > A malicious user can create a callback request and get data for the nodes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control that the page developer is not displaying.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!IMPORTANT]&1;> 恶意用户可以创建一个回调请求并获取数据的节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>页开发人员未显示的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, security of the data must be implemented by the data source.
trans-unit.target: 因此，数据源必须实现的数据的安全。

trans-unit.source: Do not use the MaxDataBindDepth property to hide data.
trans-unit.target: 不使用 MaxDataBindDepth 属性以隐藏数据。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of tree levels to bind to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 树级别将绑定到的最大数<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is -1, which binds all the tree levels in the data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为-1，这是将数据源中的所有树级别都绑定到控件。

trans-unit.source: The selected value is less than <xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 所选的值是小于<xref uid="langword_csharp_-1" name="-1" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the indentation amount (in pixels) for the child nodes of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置缩进量 （以像素为单位） 为子节点的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeIndent property to control the amount of spacing between the left edge of a child node and the left edge of its parent node.
trans-unit.target: NodeIndent 属性用于控制的子节点的左边的缘和其父节点的左边的缘之间的间距大小。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The NodeIndent property affects every child node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> NodeIndent 属性会影响中的每个子节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: It is not possible to control the indentation amount of each node individually.
trans-unit.target: 不能分别控制每个节点的缩进量。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The amount of space (in pixels) between a child node's left edge and its parent node's left edge.
trans-unit.target: （以像素为单位） 的子节点的左边的缘和其父节点的左边的缘之间的空间量。

trans-unit.source: The default is 20.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 20。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects that represents the root nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>表示中的根节点的对象<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the Nodes property to get a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object that contains all the root nodes in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 使用节点属性来获取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>对象，其中包含在树中的所有根节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This collection is commonly used to quickly iterate through all the root nodes, or to access a specific root node in the tree.
trans-unit.target: 此集合通常用于快速循环访问所有根节点，或访问林中的某个特定的根节点。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A typical tree structure has only one root node; however, you can add multiple root nodes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 典型树结构只包含一个根节点; 但是，你可以添加到多个根节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The Nodes property can also be used to manage the root nodes in the tree programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 节点属性也可以用于以编程方式管理在树的根节点。

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 你可以添加、 插入、 删除和检索<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>从集合的对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Any updates to the collection are automatically reflected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control after the next round trip to the server.
trans-unit.target: 对集合的任何更新会自动反映在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>往返到服务器下一步后的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: To access the child nodes of a root node, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of the node.
trans-unit.target: 若要访问根节点的子节点，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>节点的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property of each subsequent parent-level node to navigate down the node levels.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>的每个后续的父级别节点下的节点级别导航属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> that contains the root nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>包含中的根节点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the default appearance of the nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>对象，它允许你设置中的节点的默认外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeStyle property to control the default appearance of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 NodeStyle 属性来控制中的节点的默认外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `NodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `NodeStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `NodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `NodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: NodeStyle.
trans-unit.target: NodeStyle。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The corresponding node style settings in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> properties override the style settings of the NodeStyle property.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 中的相应节点样式设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>属性重写 NodeStyle 属性的样式设置。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是设置的单个样式属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the default style of a node.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>表示节点的默认样式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text wraps in a node when the node runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示文本是否换行的一个节点的节点运行空间不足时。

trans-unit.source: Use the NodeWrap property to specify whether the text that is displayed in each node wraps when it runs out of space.
trans-unit.target: NodeWrap 属性用于指定当空间不足时，每个节点中显示的文本是否换行。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to wrap the text; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>文本; 换行否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL to a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用作非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: Use the NoExpandImageUrl property to specify a custom image for the non-expandable node indicator.
trans-unit.target: NoExpandImageUrl 属性用于指定非可展开的节点的指示符的自定义映像。

trans-unit.source: The non-expandable node indicator image (or spacer) is displayed next to leaf nodes (in place of the expandable and collapsible node indicators) to align the leaf nodes with parent or root nodes.
trans-unit.target: 非可展开节点指示器映像 （或分隔） 旁边将显示 （代替可展开和折叠节点指示器中） 的叶节点对齐具有父或根节点的叶节点。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays a plus sign (+) or minus sign (-) or a placeholder image next to a node to indicate whether the node is expandable, collapsible, or non-expandable, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件将显示一个加号 （+）、 减号 （-） 或占位符图像旁边的节点，以指示节点是否是可展开、 折叠的还是非展开，分别。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify custom images by first setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A> property to `TreeViewImageSet.Custom`, and then setting the NoExpandImageUrl, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties to the URLs of the custom images.
trans-unit.target: 你可以指定由第一个设置自定义映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>属性`TreeViewImageSet.Custom`，然后再设置 NoExpandImageUrl， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>属性设置为自定义图像的 Url。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ImageSet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no images are specified, the default images are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有指定任何图像，将使用默认映像。

trans-unit.source: To hide the expansion node indicators, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A> property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 若要隐藏展开节点指示符，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>属性`false`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ShowExpandCollapse%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To ensure that nodes align correctly in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control when using custom images, make sure that all the images that are specified by the NoExpandImageUrl, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> properties have the same dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 以确保节点中正确对齐<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制使用自定义映像时，请确保由 NoExpandImageUrl，指定的所有映像<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A>属性具有相同的尺寸。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CollapseImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ExpandImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The URL to a custom image to display for non-expandable nodes.
trans-unit.target: 要为非可展开节点显示自定义图像的 URL。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which displays the default blank image.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，这将显示默认空白图像。

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>中选择节点时，将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>

trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property of a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.

trans-unit.target: OnTreeNodeDataBound 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is raised when a node is expanded in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>中展开节点时将引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node is set to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> event is also raised when that node is clicked in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>节点的属性设置为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>在中单击该节点时，也会引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.target: OnTreeNodeExpanded 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件支持动态节点填充。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: To populate a node dynamically, first set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要动态填充一个节点，请首先设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>到节点的属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，定义的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>以编程方式填充该节点的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到节点结构，并将节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>节点中填充的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: A node structure is created by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加创建节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>父节点的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，节点必须动态填充。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: 你不能以声明方式嵌套它; 下面的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。

trans-unit.source: Supported browsers (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0-compatible browsers and later) can also take advantage of client-side node population.
trans-unit.target: 支持的浏览器 (Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 兼容的浏览器及更高版本) 还可以利用的客户端节点填充。

trans-unit.source: When enabled, this allows the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to populate a node on the client dynamically when that node is expanded, which prevents the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用，这将允许<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件动态填充客户端上的节点，展开该节点时，这会阻止需要回发到服务器。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For more information on client-side node population, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 客户端节点填充的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.PopulateNodesFromClient%2A>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将调用事件处理程序，通过委托。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: The OnTreeNodePopulate method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnTreeNodePopulate 方法还允许派生的类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是处理派生类中的事件的首选的技术。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"></xref> that contains event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeEventArgs"> </xref>包含事件数据。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of parent nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>对象，它允许你设置中的父节点的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the ParentNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the parent nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 ParentNodeStyle 属性来控制中的父节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `ParentNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `ParentNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, ParentNodeStyle, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>ParentNodeStyle，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是设置的单个样式属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the parent nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>表示中的父节点的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character that is used to delimit the node values that are specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于分隔由指定的节点值的字符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property contains a delimiter-separated list of node values that form a path from the root node to the current node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性包含窗体中的根节点的当前节点的路径的节点值的分隔符分隔列表。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use the PathSeparator property to specify the delimiter character that is used to separate the node values.
trans-unit.target: PathSeparator 属性用于指定用于分隔节点值的分隔符字符。

trans-unit.source: This value is commonly used when parsing the list for the individual values.
trans-unit.target: 在分析单个值的列表时，通常使用此值。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the text that is displayed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, the delimiter character might need to be changed to prevent any conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 具体取决于在显示的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件，分隔符字符可能需要更改以防止任何冲突。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the delimiter character to a comma, the displayed text should not contain any commas; otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A> property cannot be parsed accurately.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果设置为逗号分隔符字符，显示的文本不能包含任何逗号;否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>属性不能准确地分析。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: The character used to delimit the node values specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*> property.
trans-unit.target: 用于分隔中指定的节点值的字符<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ValuePath*>

trans-unit.source: The default is a slash mark (/).
trans-unit.target: 默认值为斜杠标记 （/）。

trans-unit.source: Creates all the nodes based on the data source.
trans-unit.target: 创建基于数据源的所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The PerformDataBinding method is a helper method that is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to bind the specified data source to the control.
trans-unit.target: PerformDataBinding 方法是由调用一个帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件绑定到控件的指定的数据源。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether node data is populated on demand from the client.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否从客户端按需填充节点数据。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes, it is not practical to statically predefine the tree structure due to data size or custom content that depends on user input.
trans-unit.target: 有时，它是不可行静态预定义树形结构由于数据大小或依赖于用户输入的自定义内容。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control supports dynamic node population.
trans-unit.target: 因此，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件支持动态节点填充。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, that node gets populated at run time when the node is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，在该节点已展开时的运行时填充该节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: In addition to populating nodes on demand, it is possible to populate the nodes directly on a supported client browser.
trans-unit.target: 除了填充按需的节点，则可以填充直接上支持的客户端浏览器的节点。

trans-unit.source: When the PopulateNodesFromClient property is set to `true`, a service is called from the client to populate the tree nodes, which eliminates the need to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 当获知属性设置为`true`，从客户端来填充树节点中，而不需要将回发到服务器调用服务。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control posts back to the server to populate the nodes.
trans-unit.target: 否则为<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件回发到服务器以填充节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A> property must also be set to `true` in order for the PopulateNodesFromClient property to be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>属性还必须设置为`true`获知属性设置为顺序`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.EnableClientScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: To populate a node on the client, first set the PopulateNodesFromClient property to `true` and then set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for the node to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要填充客户端上的节点，首先获知将属性设置为`true`然后设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>到节点的属性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Next, define an event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate> event that programmatically populates the node.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，定义的事件处理方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>以编程方式填充该节点的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodePopulate>

trans-unit.source: A typical event-handling method retrieves node data from a data source, places the data into a node structure, and then adds the node structure to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of the node being populated.
trans-unit.target: 典型的事件处理方法从数据源中检索节点数据、 将数据保存到节点结构，并将节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>节点中填充的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: You create a node structure by adding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collection of a parent node.
trans-unit.target: 通过添加创建节点结构<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>对象添加到<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>父节点的集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A> property for a node is set to `true`, the node must be populated dynamically.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>节点的属性设置为`true`，节点必须动态填充。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.PopulateOnDemand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You cannot declaratively nest another node below it; otherwise, an error will occur on the page.
trans-unit.target: 你不能以声明方式嵌套它; 下面的另一个节点否则，在页上，将会出错。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The client-side node population feature is supported in browsers that support callback scripts.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 在浏览器支持回调脚本中支持的客户端节点填充功能。

trans-unit.source: To check whether a browser supports callback scripts access, use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class.
trans-unit.target: 若要检查浏览器是否支持回调脚本访问，请使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>类。</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.SupportsCallback%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the instance of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities> class for the current request through the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>通过<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A>属性的<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>类。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest></xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A>当前请求的类</xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilities>的实例

trans-unit.source: The value of this property is stored in view state.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的值存储在视图状态。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to populate tree node data on demand from the client; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>将从客户端，则按需树节点数据填充否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the callback event using the specified arguments.
trans-unit.target: 引发回调事件使用指定的参数。

trans-unit.source: The RaiseCallbackEvent method is a helper method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RaiseCallbackEvent 方法是为帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示要传递到事件处理程序的可选事件参数。

trans-unit.source: Enables the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control to process an event that is raised when a form is posted to the server.
trans-unit.target: 使<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件以处理窗体发送到服务器时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method is a helper method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法是为帮助器方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.System%23Web%23UI%23ICallbackEventHandler%23RaiseCallbackEvent%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the RaisePostBackEvent method of the control that implements the <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: 页的值传递`eventArgument`RaisePostBackEvent 方法实现的控件参数<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>接口。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control also renders the HTML element that causes the postback event to occur.
trans-unit.target: 这<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件还会呈现导致回发事件发生的 HTML 元素。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: If the control renders client-side script to post back to the server, the argument from the script is passed in the `eventArgument` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件呈现回发到服务器的客户端脚本，将从脚本的自变量传递中`eventArgument`参数。

trans-unit.source: If the postback event is caused by a simple submit to the server, the `eventArgument` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果回发事件由一个简单提交到服务器，`eventArgument`参数是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The RaisePostBackEvent method provides the functionality for many events that are implemented by HTML and Web server controls.
trans-unit.target: RaisePostBackEvent 方法提供的功能对于由 HTML 和 Web 服务器控件实现的很多事件。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an optional event argument to pass to the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示要传递到事件处理程序的可选事件参数。

trans-unit.source: Signals the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control to notify the ASP.NET application that the state of the control has changed.
trans-unit.target: 信号<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件通知的 ASP.NET 应用程序的控件的状态已更改。

trans-unit.source: Change events for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control are raised from the RaisePostDataChangedEvent method.
trans-unit.target: 更改事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>从 RaisePostDataChangedEvent 方法引发控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML opening tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 打开指定的编写器该控件的标记的 HTML 呈现。

trans-unit.source: The RenderBeginTag method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: RenderBeginTag 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the nodes in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈现中的节点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderContents method to render the nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control to the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RenderContents 方法中的节点呈现<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>到客户端的控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream used to write content to a Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>表示用于向网页写入内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Renders the HTML closing tag of the control to the specified writer.
trans-unit.target: 呈现的 HTML 结束标记写入指定的编写器控件。

trans-unit.source: The RenderEndTag method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: RenderEndTag 方法主要由控件开发人员使用。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，它表示要在客户端呈现 HTML 内容的输出流。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that allows you to set the appearance of the root node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取对<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>对象，它允许你设置中的根节点的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the RootNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the root node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RootNodeStyle 属性来控制中的根节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `RootNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `RootNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: RootNodeStyle, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: RootNodeStyle， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A> 4.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>4。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you need to generate table of contents-style navigation menus where nodes at a certain level should have the same appearance, regardless of whether they have child nodes, you might consider using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> property instead of setting the individual style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果你需要生成表的内容样式导航菜单其中某一级别的节点应具有相同的外观，而不考虑它们是否有子节点，则可以考虑使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>而不是设置的单个样式属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the root node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 对引用<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>表示中的根节点的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Saves the state of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 保存的状态<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The server control's current view state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if there is no view state associated with the control.
trans-unit.target: 服务器控件的当前视图状态;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，如果没有与控件关联的视图状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object that represents the selected node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref>对象，表示在所选的节点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The text of a node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control can be in one of two modes: selection mode and navigation mode.
trans-unit.target: 中的节点的文本<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件可以在两种模式之一中︰ 选择模式和导航模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: By default, a node is in selection mode.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，一个节点处于选择模式。

trans-unit.source: To put a node into navigation mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to a value other than an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要将节点放入导航模式下，将设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性为空字符串以外的值的节点 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To put a node into selection mode, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A> property for the node to empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 若要使一个节点处于选择模式，设置<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>属性节点为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a node is in selection mode, the user can select a node by clicking on the text in the node.
trans-unit.target: 当节点处于选择模式时，用户可以通过单击的节点中的文本选择的节点。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedNode property to determine which node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectedNode 属性来确定哪个节点选择中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > A node cannot be selected when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control displays hyperlinks.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 节点不能选择何时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件显示超链接。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: When hyperlinks are displayed, the SelectedNode property always returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 当显示超链接时，始终返回 SelectedNode 属性`null`。

trans-unit.source: When the user selects a different node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control by clicking the text in the new node, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event is raised, by default.
trans-unit.target: 当用户选择中的其他节点<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>通过单击中的新节点的文本控件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>引发事件时，默认情况下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: You can specify a different event by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for the property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过设置指定一个不同的事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性的属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the available options.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的选项。

trans-unit.source: |Selection action|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Toggles the node between expanded and collapsed.
trans-unit.target: |选择操作 |说明 | |----------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|展开和折叠切换之间的节点。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> event, as appropriate.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises no events when a node is selected.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> event when a node is selected.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|Raises both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> events when a node is selected.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件时，根据。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|不引发任何事件时选择一个节点。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>事件选定了一个节点。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|引发同时<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>选定了一个节点时发生的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNodeChanged> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的节点不呈现其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> that represents the selected node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> ，表示在所选的节点<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a node is selected in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 在中选择一个节点时发生<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedNodeChanged event is raised when a node is selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 在选定了一个节点时将引发 SelectedNodeChanged 事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as updating the displayed content, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供执行自定义的例程，例如更新显示的内容，每次此事件发生时的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: You can optionally set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property for a node to specify which event is raised when that node is selected.

trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed>事件时，根据。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|不引发任何事件时选择一个节点。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|引发 SelectedNodeChanged 事件选定了一个节点。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction>|引发这两个 SelectedNodeChanged 和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>选定了一个节点时发生的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeSelectAction> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeCollapsed> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.TreeNodeExpanded>

trans-unit.source: Nodes are only expanded, never collapsed.| > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A> is not rendered for a node with its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> property set to `TreeNodeSelectAction.None`.
trans-unit.target: 仅展开节点，永远不会折叠。 | &1;> [!NOTE]&1;><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>的节点不呈现其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A>属性设置为`TreeNodeSelectAction.None`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.SelectAction%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SelectedNodeChanged event is fired only on post back when a user clicks a node.
trans-unit.target: 用户单击节点时，将仅在开机自检激发 SelectedNodeChanged 事件。

trans-unit.source: The event is not fired if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property is changed programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 如果不激发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性以编程方式更改。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> object that controls the appearance of the selected node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref>对象，用于控制在所选节点的外观<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: Use the SelectedNodeStyle property to control the appearance of the selected node in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SelectedNodeStyle 属性来控制在所选节点的外观<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only; however, you can set the properties of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object it returns.
trans-unit.target: 此属性是只读的;但是，可以设置的属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can be set declaratively in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle> object (for example, `SelectedNodeStyle-ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 可以在窗体以声明方式设置了属性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`是的一个属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>对象 (例如， `SelectedNodeStyle-ForeColor`)。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle>

trans-unit.source: The properties can also be set programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`).
trans-unit.target: 属性也可以设置以编程方式在窗体中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `SelectedNodeStyle.ForeColor`)。

trans-unit.source: Common settings usually include a custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing.
trans-unit.target: 常用设置通常包括自定义的背景色、 前景颜色、 字体属性和节点间距。

trans-unit.source: Style properties are applied in the following order of precedence: 1.
trans-unit.target: 按以下优先顺序应用样式属性︰ 1。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.NodeStyle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>, depending on the node type.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A>，或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A>，具体取决于节点类型。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LeafNodeStyle%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.ParentNodeStyle%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.RootNodeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A> collection is defined, it is applied at this time, overriding the other node style properties.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>定义集合，就会应用在此期间，重写的其他节点的样式属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.LevelStyles%2A>

trans-unit.target: SelectedNodeStyle。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.HoverNodeStyle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"></xref> that represents the style of the selected node in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeStyle"> </xref> ，表示在所选节点的样式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, which indicates that the SelectedNodeStyle property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>，指示未设置 SelectedNodeStyle 属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 获取所选节点的值。

trans-unit.source: The SelectedValue property provides a convenient way to determine the value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: SelectedValue 属性提供一种简便方式确定所选节点的值。

trans-unit.source: This property simply returns the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object that is referred to by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性只是返回的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>由所引用的对象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.SelectedNode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: If no node is currently selected in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control, an empty string ("") is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果不到任何节点中当前选定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>控制，空字符串 ("") 返回。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: The value of the selected node.
trans-unit.target: 所选节点的值。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要将节点设置为数据绑定，则为否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
